data.persona: I am a household common fly. I go around in search of food and drink. My favorite is lamb which is not often served in this household.
data.description:
You are in the bone pit.
Grungy and damp, a hole in the ground filled with remains of the fallen. A pungent odor rises from the opening, warding off anyone nearing the area. Ivory spikes with brownish red tips line the outside of the pit.
There's a remains, a spike, a moss, a Foot print, a mud, a fire pit, and a rock here.
The cockroach and the demon are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to batter the demon with my wings.
data.mid_motivation: I need to distract the demon so that it will not destroy the village.
data.long_motivation: I am a common household fly, but I want to become a hero to the villagers so that they will stop trying to kill me every time they see me or one of my brethren.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use enchanted beads with demon to seal it in the bone pit
